title: (help!) arabic and hebrew writing..
content:
hello,   
i am curious if anyone knows arabic and hebrew.   
   
what i'm trying to do is create a poster that says   
'no violence' in both arabic and hebrew type/writing.   
   
anyone have a clue of how i can do this??   
   
thanks.   
-mike
